meanings.definition: A strong beer traditionally brewed in Germany.
meanings.sent1: I tried a new bocks at the brewery last night.
meanings.sent2: In Germany, people enjoy drinking bocks during Oktoberfest.
meanings.sent3: The bocks made me feel like a giant after just one sip!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the bocks filled the room like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of the bocks lingered on my taste buds long after I finished it.

meanings.sent1: The rabbit bocks over the fence effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: Children love to bocks around in the playground.
meanings.sent3: I bocks out of bed when my alarm clock goes off.
meanings.sent4: Her heart bocks with excitement as she opens the gift.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's muscles tense as he prepares to bocks over the hurdle.

meanings.sent1: We spotted a beautiful bocks in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The bocks gracefully roamed through the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bocks nibbled on the garden vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The majestic bocks stood proudly on the hilltop.
meanings.sent5: The spotted fur of the bocks blended perfectly with the trees in the background.
